How to create a sprite


Vocabulary

  • Algorithm - A list of steps to complete a task.
  • Behavior - An action in Sprite Lab that a sprite performs continuously until it‚Äôs told to stop.
  • Program - An algorithm that has been coded into something that can be run by a machine.
  • Sprite - A graphic on the screen with a location, size, and appearance.

1. Gama Sol Major- upper half, lower half, stopped bows: 2, 3, 4, 6, 8. Legato: 2, 3, 4, 6, 8. Watch out for the fourth finger that it lands in the right spot!
  2. Viva Vibrato #4-#10
  3. Bourree I & II first 7 lines. Notes: practice with metronome at 80 bpm- pizzicato and then with bow in smaller sections. Leave out the chords if you are getting off track and then add them back in. Pay attention to dynamics and watch your bow as much as you can. Vocabulary

  • Algorithm - A list of steps to complete a task.
  • Behavior - An action in Sprite Lab that a sprite performs continuously until it‚Äôs told to stop.
  • Program - An algorithm that has been coded into something that can be run by a machine.
  • Sprite - A graphic on the screen with a location, size, and appearance.

741c229b-9b6c-4104-8019-95c5f58bace5.content:
Ce am fƒÉcut azi:

  • Am fƒÉcut cuno»ôtin»õƒÉ cu un nou robo»õel: Charlie.
  • Am √ÆnvƒÉ»õat despre procente:
  • 100%: vitezƒÉ maximƒÉ
  • 50%: vitezƒÉ la jumƒÉtate
  • 25%: un sfert din viteza maximƒÉ
  • 0%: oprit
  • Am combinat secven»õe repeat √Æntr-un dans complex.
  • Robo»õelul face o piruetƒÉ st√¢nga-dreapta de douƒÉ ori (√Æntr-un repeat)
  • Robo»õelul mi»ôcƒÉ m√¢inile de douƒÉ ori (√Æntr-un alt repeat)
  • Ac»õiunile anterioare sunt repetate de 3 ori (adƒÉugate √Æntr-un repeat tatƒÉ)
  • Am construit un "ochi" pentru Charlie care √Æi permite sƒÉ recunoascƒÉ culori (un senzor de culoare).
  • Am vƒÉzut un program pre-existent care √Æi permite lui Charlie sƒÉ facƒÉ diverse ac»õiuni √Æn func»õie de culoarea vƒÉzutƒÉ:
  • Verde ‚Äî piruetƒÉ
  • Ro»ôu ‚Äî vine spre mine
  • Galben ‚Äî fuge de mine »ôi strigƒÉ
  • Albastru ‚Äî rƒÉm√¢ne pe data viitoare...
  • Data viitoare vom construi chiar noi un astfel de program, »ôi vom recapitula "if-then-else" ca sƒÉ creƒÉm acest program.
